mapper.select: /* com.example.demo.repository.MemberRepository.getAllMember (tb_member 조회) */ SELECT mbr_no , cust_no , mbr_type_cd , mbr_nm , eng_mbr_nm , job_pos_cd , phone_no , phone_no2 , email , login_yn , cust_charge_yn , user_id , user_pwd , use_yn , reg_dt , reg_mbr_no , upd_dt , upd_mbr_no , login_fail_cnt , final_login_dt , email_yn , activity_yn , vend_no FROM tb_member
